commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: The champion of our sports battle is...Rina Tennoji!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Congratulations, Rina!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: What an amazing turn-around we just witnessed! I'm incredibly impressed!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Thanks, everyone. Rina-chan Board says, "All smiles."

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: So what was it you did at the end there, with that huge burst of speed? Can pocketbikes accelerate that fast?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Not the pocketbikes here, no. That was because I used my Rina-chan Booster, a propulsion booster I brought with me, just in case I needed it.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: What...did you just say?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Oh yeah, partway through the race I saw Rina attaching something to her bike. Was that the...booster thingy?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: That's not fair! Of course she's gonna win if she has something like that!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: There was no rule against using tools.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Nooo... Then next time, I'm gonna stick one of those on my bike too!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Rina really came prepared for anything! I'm surprised, but not shocked at all.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: What in the world kind of scenario were you preparing for? Did you know we'd be competing with pocketbikes?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Now it's time to announce the prize you're all so curious about! The deluxe prize that our champion, Rina, will receive is... A one-night luxury package stay at Hotel Ohara!

commands.speaker: Setsuna, Hanamaru, Rin, Eli
commands.line: Oooh!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Hotel Ohara... You mean Mari's fancy family hotel?! Oh wow! That really is a deluxe prize!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: You really did put a lot of thought into this... Right up until the last minute, I was sure you'd just made up there being a prize.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Eli, you're so, so mean to me! I would never lie!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: You lied about there being a cat.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: That was an unavoidable lie so I could win the battle... I need you to understand how rough it was for me!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: And yet you overtook us with glee.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: If the championship prize is a stay at your hotel where you live, then...what would you have done if you won, Mari?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: If I'd won, I planned to make each of you do me one favor. Like accompany me to a buffet full of the world's delicacies, or go to see the night lights of Las Vegas!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Um... A hotel room sounds fun too, but... I'd like to stay in your room, Mari.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: My room?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah. I don't want to stay as a guest, but, umm...as your friend. I want to stay up all night talking.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Oh, Rina! All right, sure! Come have a sleepover at my place! It doesn't have to be just one night, you can stay as long as you want!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I still have school, so I think just one night is enough... But thanks, I'm excited.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: When will you come? Next week? No, come tonight! Let's go to my place after this! I'll call the chopper and we'll fly straight to Awashima!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Hold on now, I think that's a bit sudden. She's not ready for a sleepover.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: We can just prepare everything once we're there. Oh, I know! Let's all go!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Y-You mean us?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: A sleepover with everyone! That sounds really fun! Rina-chan Board says, "Woo-hoo!"

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Then it's settled! We're having a slumber party tonight!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Hold on! Listen to me, both of you!
